effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for both opposing and ally Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
とうじょう　したときに　てきと　みかたの
ひかりのかべ　リフレクター
オーロラベールの　こうかが　きえる。

등장했을 때 상대와 같은 편의
빛의장막, 리플렉터, 오로라베일의
효과가 사라진다.

出場時，敵方和我方的
光牆、反射壁和極光幕的效果會消失。

Quand le Pokémon entre au combat, les effets
de Mur Lumière, Protection et Voile Aurore
disparaissent pour les alliés comme pour les ennemis.

Hebt bei Kampfantritt die Wirkung von Lichtschild,
Reflektor und Auroraschleier auf Mitstreiter- und
Gegnerseite auf.

Anula los efectos de Pantalla de Luz, Reflejo y Velo
Aurora tanto de rivales como de aliados al entrar en
combate.

Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, annulla l’effetto
di Schermoluce, Riflesso e Velaurora sia per i nemici
che per gli alleati.

When the Pokémon enters a battle, the effects of
Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil are nullified for
both opposing and ally Pokémon.

登場　したときに　敵と　味方の
ひかりのかべ　リフレクター
オーロラベールの　効果が　消える。

出场时，敌方和我方的光墙、
反射壁和极光幕的效果会消失。
Quand le Pokémon entre au combat, les effets de\nMur Lumière, Protection et Voile Aurore disparaissent\npour les alliés comme pour les adversaires.

effect_entries.effect: Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.
effect_entries.short_effect: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
みかたの　はがねタイプの
こうげきの　いりょくが　あがる。

같은 편의 강철타입
공격의 위력이 올라간다.

我方的鋼屬性
攻擊威力會提高。

Augmente la puissance d’Attaque des capacités
de type Acier des Pokémon alliés.

Erhöht die Stärke von Stahl-Attacken auf
Mitstreiterseite.
Potencia los movimientos de tipo Acero de los aliados.
Potenzia gli attacchi di tipo Acciaio degli alleati.
Powers up ally Pokémon’s Steel-type moves.

味方の　はがねタイプの
攻撃の　威力が　上がる。

我方的钢属性
攻击威力会提高。
Augmente la puissance des attaques de type Acier\ndu Pokémon et de ses alliés.
Powers up the Steel-type moves of the Pokémon and its allies.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon with Perish Body is hit with a contact move, both the attacker and the Pokémon with Perish Body will faint in three turns.
effect_entries.short_effect: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
せっしょくする　わざを　うけると
おたがい　３ターン　たつと　ひんしになる。
こうたいすると　こうかは　なくなる。

접촉하는 기술을 받으면
3턴 후에 양쪽 모두 기절한다.
교체되면 효과가 없어진다.

在受到接觸類招式攻擊時，
３個回合後雙方都會陷入瀕死。
替換寶可夢後效果就會消失。

Lorsque le Pokémon est directement touché par
une attaque, l’assaillant et lui tomberont K.O. dans trois
tours, à moins qu’ils ne soient remplacés entre temps.

Erleidet es einen Treffer von einer direkten Attacke,
wird es zusammen mit dem Angreifer nach drei Runden
besiegt. Rettung ist durch Austausch möglich.

Si le alcanza un movimiento de contacto, se debilitará
al cabo de 3 turnos, así como su agresor, a menos que
abandonen el terreno de combate.

Se il Pokémon viene colpito da un attacco diretto,
dopo tre turni va KO assieme a chi lo ha attaccato.
Se uno dei due viene sostituito, non va KO.

When hit by a move that makes direct contact,
the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns
unless they switch out of battle.

接触する　技を　受けると
お互い　３ターン　たつと　ひんしになる。
交代すると　効果は　なくなる。

受到接触类招式攻击时，
双方都会在３回合后变为濒死状态。
替换后效果消失。
Lorsque le Pokémon est directement touché par\nune capacité, l’assaillant et lui tomberont K.O. dans trois\ntours, à moins qu’ils ne soient remplacés entre temps.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.
effect_entries.short_effect: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
せっしょくする　わざで
こうげき　してきた　ポケモンと
とくせいを　いれかえる。

접촉하는 기술로
공격해온 포켓몬과
특성을 바꾼다.

與使用接觸類招式
攻擊自己的寶可夢互換特性。

Lorsque le Pokémon est directement touché
par une attaque, il échange son talent avec celui
de l’assaillant.

Wird das Pokémon von einer direkten Attacke
getroffen, tauscht es seine Fähigkeit mit der des
Angreifers.

Si le alcanza un movimiento de contacto, intercambia
su habilidad con la del agresor.

Se il Pokémon subisce un attacco diretto, scambia
la sua abilità con quella di chi lo ha colpito.

The Pokémon exchanges Abilities with a Pokémon
that hits it with a move that makes direct contact.

接触する　技で
攻撃　してきた　ポケモンと
特性を　入れ替える。

与使用接触类招式
攻击自己的宝可梦互换特性。
Lorsque le Pokémon est directement touché\npar une capacité, il échange son talent avec\ncelui de l’assaillant.

effect_entries.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
こうげきは　あがるが
さいしょに　えらんだ
わざしか　だせなくなる。

공격이 올라가지만
처음에 선택한
기술 외에는 쓸 수 없게 된다.

攻擊雖然會提高，
但只能使出
最初選擇的招式。

Augmente l’Attaque, mais empêche d’utiliser
toute autre capacité que celle utilisée en premier
par le Pokémon.

Erhöht den Angriff, aber nur die zuerst gewählte
Attacke kann eingesetzt werden.

Potencia su Ataque, pero solo puede usar el primer
movimiento escogido.

Aumenta l’Attacco ma costringe il Pokémon a usare
solo la prima mossa selezionata.

Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat but only allows
the use of the first selected move.

攻撃は　上がるが
最初に　選んだ
技しか　出せなくなる。

虽然攻击会提高，
但是只能使出
一开始所选的招式。
Augmente l’Attaque, mais empêche d’utiliser\ntoute autre capacité que celle utilisée en premier\npar le Pokémon.

effect_entries.effect: While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.
effect_entries.short_effect: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
かがくへんかガスの　ポケモンが　ばにいると
すべての　ポケモンの　とくせいの
こうかが　きえたり　はつどう　しなくなる。

화학변화가스를 가진 포켓몬이 배틀에 나와 있으면
모든 포켓몬이 가진 특성의 효과가
사라지거나 발동하지 않게 된다.

當場上有特性是化學變化氣體的寶可夢時，
所有寶可夢的特性效果
都會消失或無法發動。

Si un Pokémon avec Gaz Inhibiteur est sur le terrain,
les effets des talents de tous les autres Pokémon
sont annulés.

Solange ein Pokémon mit der Fähigkeit Reaktionsgas
am Kampf beteiligt ist, werden die Fähigkeiten aller
anderen Pokémon unterdrückt oder aufgehoben.

Anula los efectos de las habilidades de los demás
Pokémon presentes mientras esté en el terreno de
combate.

Se in campo c’è un Pokémon con Gas Reagente,
gli effetti delle abilità di tutti gli altri Pokémon
vengono annullati o non si attivano.

If the Pokémon with Neutralizing Gas is in the battle,
the effects of all Pokémon’s Abilities will be nullified
or will not be triggered.

かがくへんかガスの　ポケモンが　場にいると
すべての　ポケモンの　特性の
効果が　消えたり　発動　しなくなる。

特性为化学变化气体的宝可梦在场时，
场上所有宝可梦的
特性效果都会消失或者无法生效。
Si un Pokémon avec Gaz Inhibiteur est sur le terrain,\nles effets des talents de tous les autres Pokémon ne\ns’activent pas ou sont neutralisés.
While the Pokémon is in the battle, the effects of all other Pokémon's Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

effect_entries.effect: Prevents the Pokémon and its teammates from being poisoned. It also cures teammates of poisoning when it enters the battlefield.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
じぶんも　みかたも
どくの　じょうたいいじょうを
うけなくなる。

자신과 같은 편이
독의 상태 이상 효과를
받지 않게 된다.

自己和我方同伴都不會
陷入中毒的異常狀態。

Protège le Pokémon et ses alliés contre toutes
les altérations de statut liées à l’empoisonnement.

Schützt das Pokémon und seine Mitstreiter vor
Vergiftung.

Se protege a sí mismo y a sus aliados del
envenenamiento.

Protegge il Pokémon e gli alleati dai problemi di stato
causati dal veleno.

Protects the Pokémon and its ally Pokémon from
being poisoned.

自分も　味方も
どくの　状態異常を
受けなくなる。

自己和同伴都不会
陷入中毒的异常状态。
Protège le Pokémon et ses alliés contre toutes\nles altérations de statut liées à l’empoisonnement.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.
effect_entries.short_effect: Causes Morpeko to change its form each turn, alternating between Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
ターンの　おわりに　まんぷくもよう
はらぺこもよう　まんぷくもよう……と
こうごに　すがたを　かえる。

턴이 끝날 때마다 배부른 모양,
배고픈 모양, 배부른 모양...으로
번갈아서 모습을 바꾼다.

在每個回合結束時，
會在滿腹花紋和空腹花紋之間
交替改變樣子。

À la fin de chaque tour, le Pokémon alterne
entre ses formes Mode Rassasié et Mode Affamé.

Das Pokémon ändert zum Ende jeder Runde seine
Form und wechselt somit zwischen dem Pappsatt- und
dem Kohldampfmuster.

Alterna entre su Forma Saciada y Forma Voraz al final
de cada turno.

Alla fine di ogni turno cambia forma, alternando
tra Motivo Panciapiena e Motivo Panciavuota.

The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between
its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of
each turn.

ターンの　終わりに　まんぷくもよう
はらぺこもよう　まんぷくもよう……と
交互に　姿を　変える。

每回合结束时会在
满腹花纹与空腹花纹之间
交替改变样子。
À la fin de chaque tour, le Pokémon alterne\nentre ses formes Mode Rassasié et Mode Affamé.
The Pokémon changes its form, alternating between its Full Belly Mode and Hangry Mode after the end of every turn.

effect_entries.effect: If a Pokémon with this Ability selects a damaging move, it has a 30% chance of going first in its priority bracket.
effect_entries.short_effect: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
あいてより　さきに
こうどう　できることが　ある。

상대보다 먼저
행동할 수도 있다.
有時能比對手先一步行動。
Permet parfois au Pokémon d’agir en premier.
Ermöglicht dem Pokémon gelegentlich den Erstschlag.
A veces, puede atacar el primero.
A volte permette al Pokémon di agire per primo.
Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

相手より　先に
行動できることが　ある。
有时能比对手先一步行动。
Permet parfois au Pokémon d’agir en premier.
Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.

effect_entries.effect: If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.
effect_entries.short_effect: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
あいてに　せっしょくする　わざなら
まもりの　こうかを
むしして　こうげき　することが　できる。

상대에게 접촉하는 기술을 사용하면
방어의 효과를 무시하고 공격할 수 있다.

只要是接觸到對手的招式，
就可以無視對手的防守效果進行攻擊。

Si le Pokémon utilise une attaque directe, celle-ci
pourra passer outre les protections de la cible.

Wenn das Pokémon eine direkte Attacke einsetzt,
trifft diese auch dann, wenn sich das Ziel selbst
schützt.

Si usa un movimiento de contacto, puede infligir daño
al objetivo aunque este se proteja.

Quando il Pokémon utilizza un attacco diretto,
gli effetti di mosse protettive vengono ignorati.

If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact,
it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

相手に　接触する　技なら
守りの　効果を
無視して　攻撃することが　できる。

如果使出的是接触到对手的招式，
就可以无视守护效果进行攻击。
Si le Pokémon utilise une attaque directe, celle-ci\npourra toucher la cible même si elle se protège.
If the Pokémon uses moves that make direct contact, it can attack the target even if the target protects itself.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.
effect_entries.short_effect: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
とうじょう　したときに
かいがらから　くすりを　ふりまいて
みかたの　のうりょくへんかを　もとにもどす。

등장했을 때
조개껍질에서 약을 흩뿌려서
능력 변화를 원래대로 되돌린다.

出場時，會從貝殼撒藥，
將我方的能力變化復原。

Quand il entre au combat, le Pokémon répand
une substance qui annule les changements de stats
de ses alliés.

Das Pokémon versprüht bei Kampfantritt Arznei aus
seiner Muschel, die alle Statusveränderungen auf der
Mitstreiterseite aufhebt.

Al entrar en combate, rezuma una substancia medicinal
por la caracola que revierte los cambios en las
características de los aliados.

Quando il Pokémon entra in campo, sparge un farmaco
dalla conchiglia che annulla le modifiche alle statistiche
degli alleati.

When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine
from its shell, which removes all stat changes
from allies.

登場　したときに
貝がらから　薬を　振りまいて
味方の　能力変化を　元に戻す。

出场时会从贝壳撒药，
将我方的能力变化复原。
Quand il entre au combat, le Pokémon répand\nune substance qui annule les changements de stats\nde ses alliés.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

effect_entries.effect: Increases the power of Electric-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Powers up Electric-type moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
でんきタイプの　わざの
いりょくが　あがる。

전기타입 기술의
위력이 올라간다.
電屬性的招式威力會提高。
Augmente la puissance des attaques de type Électrik.
Erhöht die Stärke von Elektro-Attacken.
Potencia los movimientos de tipo Eléctrico.
Potenzia le mosse di tipo Elettro.
Powers up Electric-type moves.

でんきタイプの　技の
威力が　上がる。
电属性的招式威力会提高。
Augmente la puissance des capacités de type Électrik.
Powers up Electric-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Powers up Dragon-type moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
ドラゴンタイプの　わざの
いりょくが　あがる。

드래곤타입 기술의
위력이 올라간다.
龍屬性的招式威力會提高。
Augmente la puissance des attaques de type Dragon.
Erhöht die Stärke von Drachen-Attacken.
Potencia los movimientos de tipo Dragón.
Potenzia le mosse di tipo Drago.
Powers up Dragon-type moves.

ドラゴンタイプの　技の
威力が　上がる。
龙属性的招式威力会提高。
Augmente la puissance des capacités de type Dragon.
Powers up Dragon-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
あいてを　たおすと
つめたい　こえで　いなないて
こうげきが　あがる。

상대를 쓰러뜨리면
차가운 울음소리를 내면서
공격이 올라간다.

打倒對手時
會用冰冷的聲音嘶鳴
並提高攻擊。

Quand le Pokémon met un ennemi K.O., il émet
un hennissement glaçant, ce qui augmente son Attaque.

Besiegt es ein Pokémon, stößt es ein frostiges Wiehern
aus und erhöht damit seinen Angriff.

Al derrotar a un objetivo, emite un relincho gélido y
aumenta su Ataque.

Quando manda KO il nemico, emette un nitrito
agghiacciante, aumentando il proprio Attacco.

When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a
chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

相手を　倒すと
冷たい　声で　いなないて
攻撃が　上がる。

打倒对手时
会用冰冷的声音嘶鸣
并提高攻击。
Quand le Pokémon met un ennemi K.O., il émet\nun hennissement glaçant, ce qui augmente son Attaque.
When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a chilling neigh, which boosts its Attack stat.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
あいてを　たおすと
おそろしい　こえで　いなないて
とくこうが　あがる。

상대를 쓰러뜨리면
무서운 울음소리를 내면서
특수공격이 올라간다.

打倒對手時
會用恐怖的聲音嘶鳴
並提高特攻。

Quand le Pokémon met un ennemi K.O., il émet
un hennissement terrifiant qui augmente
son Attaque Spéciale.

Besiegt es ein Pokémon, stößt es ein furchteinflößendes
Wiehern aus und erhöht damit seinen Spezial-Angriff.

Al derrotar a un objetivo, emite un relincho aterrador y
aumenta su Ataque Especial.

Quando manda KO il nemico, emette un nitrito
terrificante, aumentando il proprio Attacco Speciale.

When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a
terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

相手を　倒すと
恐ろしい　声で　いなないて
特攻が　上がる。

打倒对手时
会用恐怖的声音嘶鸣
并提高特攻。
Quand le Pokémon met un ennemi K.O., il émet\nun hennissement terrifiant qui augmente\nson Attaque Spéciale.
When the Pokémon knocks out a target, it utters a terrifying neigh, which boosts its Sp. Atk stat.

バドレックスの　きんちょうかんと
ブリザポスの　しろのいななきの
ふたつの　とくせいを　あわせもつ。

버드렉스의 긴장감과
블리자포스의 백의울음
두 가지 특성을 겸비한다.

兼具蕾冠王的緊張感和
雪暴馬的蒼白嘶鳴這２種特性。

Les talents Tension de Sylveroy et Blanche Ruade
de Blizzeval sont cumulés.

Das Pokémon verfügt sowohl über Coronospas Fähigkeit
Anspannung als auch über Polaross’ Fähigkeit
Helles Wiehern.

El Pokémon tiene dos habilidades: Relincho Blanco de
Glastrier y Nerviosismo de Calyrex.

Il Pokémon ha una doppia abilità: Agitazione di Calyrex
e Nitrito Bianco di Glastrier.

This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex’s
Unnerve Ability and Glastrier’s Chilling Neigh Ability.

バドレックスの　きんちょうかんと
ブリザポスの　しろのいななきの
二つの　特性を　あわせ持つ。

兼备蕾冠王的紧张感和
雪暴马的苍白嘶鸣这两种特性。
Les talents Tension de Sylveroy et Blanche Ruade\nde Blizzeval sont cumulés.
Les talents Tension de Sylveroy et Sombre Ruade\nde Spectreval sont cumulés.
This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Glastrier's Chilling Neigh Ability.

バドレックスの　きんちょうかんと
レイスポスの　くろのいななきの
ふたつの　とくせいを　あわせもつ。

버드렉스의 긴장감과
레이스포스의 흑의울음
두 가지 특성을 겸비한다.

兼具蕾冠王的緊張感和
靈幽馬的漆黑嘶鳴這２種特性。

Les talents Tension de Sylveroy et Sombre Ruade
de Spectreval sont cumulés.

Das Pokémon verfügt sowohl über Coronospas Fähigkeit
Anspannung als auch über Phantoross’ Fähigkeit
Dunkles Wiehern.

El Pokémon tiene dos habilidades: Relincho Negro de
Spectrier y Nerviosismo de Calyrex.

Il Pokémon ha una doppia abilità: Agitazione di Calyrex
e Nitrito Nero di Spectrier.

This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex’s
Unnerve Ability and Spectrier’s Grim Neigh Ability.

バドレックスの　きんちょうかんと
レイスポスの　くろのいななきの
二つの　特性を　あわせ持つ。

兼备蕾冠王的紧张感和
灵幽马的漆黑嘶鸣这两种特性。
This Ability combines the effects of both Calyrex's Unnerve Ability and Spectrier's Grim Neigh Ability.

effect_entries.effect: Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker’s Ability to Lingering Aroma.
effect_entries.short_effect: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Lorsque le Pokémon subit une attaque directe, le talent\nde l’attaquant est remplacé par Odeur Tenace.
Contact with the Pokémon changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.

effect_entries.effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
effect_entries.short_effect: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon crée un champ herbu quand\nil subit une attaque.
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.

effect_entries.effect: Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Lorsque le Pokémon est touché par une capacité de type\nFeu, son Attaque augmente. Il ne peut pas être brûlé.
Boosts the Attack stat when the Pokémon is hit by a Fire-type move. The Pokémon also cannot be burned.

effect_entries.effect: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.
effect_entries.short_effect: When the Pokémon's HP drops below half, Anger Shell lowers its Defense and Special Defense but its Attack, Special Attack and Speed are raised.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon enrage s’il a moins de la moitié de ses PV\naprès avoir subi une attaque. Sa Déf. et sa Déf. Spé.\nbaissent, et son Atq., son Atq. Spé. et sa Vit. augmentent.
When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon’s pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.
effect_entries.short_effect: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le sel pur immunise le Pokémon contre les altérations\nde statut, et diminue de moitié les dégâts des capacités\nde type Spectre.
The Pokémon's pure salt protects it from status conditions and halves the damage taken from Ghost-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.
effect_entries.short_effect: Immune to Fire-type moves, and Defense is sharply boosted.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Si le Pokémon est touché par une capacité de type Feu,\nil ne subit aucun dégât et sa Défense augmente\nbeaucoup.
The Pokémon takes no damage when hit by Fire-type moves. Instead, its Defense stat is sharply boosted.

effect_entries.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.
effect_entries.short_effect: Gives immunity to wind moves, and causes the Pokémon's Attack to increase by one stage when hit by one.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: L’Attaque du Pokémon augmente si un vent arrière souffle\nou s’il est touché par une capacité faisant appel au vent.\nDans ce dernier cas, il ne subit aucun dégât.
Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat if Tailwind takes effect or if the Pokémon is hit by a wind move. The Pokémon also takes no damage from wind moves.

effect_entries.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
effect_entries.short_effect: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: L’Attaque du Pokémon augmente s’il subit l’effet du\ntalent Intimidation. Les capacités ou objets qui font\nchanger de Pokémon n’ont aucun effet sur lui.
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

effect_entries.effect: Increases the power of Rock-type moves used by this Pokémon by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Powers up Rock-type moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Augmente la puissance des capacités de type Roche.
Powers up Rock-type moves.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
effect_entries.short_effect: When hit by a wind move, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Si le Pokémon est touché par une capacité faisant appel\nau vent, il se charge en électricité.
The Pokémon becomes charged when it is hit by a wind move, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.
effect_entries.short_effect: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon prend sa Forme Super en quittant\nle combat.
The Pokémon transforms into its Hero Form when it switches out.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.
effect_entries.short_effect: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Si un Oyacata allié est sur le terrain quand ce Pokémon\nrejoint le combat, ce dernier entre dans sa bouche et\ndevient son commandant.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field. The Pokémon then issues commands from there.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.
effect_entries.short_effect: When hit by an attack, the power of the next Electric-type move it uses is doubled.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Si le Pokémon subit des dégâts, il se charge\nen électricité.
The Pokémon becomes charged when it takes damage, boosting the power of the next Electric-type move the Pokémon uses.

effect_entries.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand le soleil brille ou que le Pokémon tient\nune capsule d’Énergie Booster, sa stat la plus élevée\naugmente.
Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat in harsh sunlight or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

effect_entries.effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand un champ électrifié est actif ou que le Pokémon\ntient une capsule d’Énergie Booster, sa stat la plus élevée\naugmente.
Boosts the Pokémon's most proficient stat on Electric Terrain or if the Pokémon is holding Booster Energy.

effect_entries.effect: A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon’s status moves.
effect_entries.short_effect: Gives immunity to status moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le corps en or pur et robuste du Pokémon l’immunise\ncontre les capacités de statut des autres Pokémon.
A body of pure, solid gold gives the Pokémon full immunity to other Pokémon's status moves.

effect_entries.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le pouvoir de l’urne qui appelle le fléau affaiblit\nl’Attaque Spéciale de tous les autres Pokémon.
The power of the Pokémon's ruinous vessel lowers the Sp. Atk stats of all Pokémon except itself.

effect_entries.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le pouvoir de l’épée qui appelle le fléau affaiblit\nla Défense de tous les autres Pokémon.
The power of the Pokémon's ruinous sword lowers the Defense stats of all Pokémon except itself.

effect_entries.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le pouvoir du bois qui appelle le fléau affaiblit\nl’Attaque de tous les autres Pokémon.
The power of the Pokémon's ruinous wooden tablets lowers the Attack stats of all Pokémon except itself.

effect_entries.effect: The power of the Pokémon’s ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le pouvoir des perles qui appellent le fléau affaiblit\nla Défense Spéciale de tous les autres Pokémon.
The power of the Pokémon's ruinous beads lowers the Sp. Def stats of all Pokémon except itself.

effect_entries.effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.
effect_entries.short_effect: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon invoque le soleil quand il rejoint le combat.\nQuand le soleil brille, une pulsation primitive augmente\nson Attaque.
Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle. The ancient pulse thrumming through the Pokémon also boosts its Attack stat in harsh sunlight.

effect_entries.effect: Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.
effect_entries.short_effect: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon crée un champ électrifié quand il rejoint\nle combat. Une machine du futur fait monter son Attaque\nSpéciale si un champ électrifié est actif.
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle. The futuristic engine within the Pokémon also boosts its Sp. Atk stat on Electric Terrain.

effect_entries.effect: If an opponent’s stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.
effect_entries.short_effect: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand les stats de l’ennemi augmentent, le Pokémon\nen profite pour augmenter ses stats de la même manière.
If an opponent's stat is boosted, the Pokémon seizes the opportunity to boost the same stat for itself.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.
effect_entries.short_effect: Causes the Pokémon to reuse an already consumed Berry at the end of the next turn.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand le Pokémon mange une Baie, il la régurgite\nà la fin du tour suivant et la mange une nouvelle fois.
When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

effect_entries.effect: Increases the power of all 'slicing' moves by 50%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Powers up slicing moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Augmente la puissance des capacités tranchantes.
Powers up slicing moves.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.
effect_entries.short_effect: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand le Pokémon entre sur le terrain, son Attaque\net son Attaque Spéciale augmentent légèrement\npour chaque allié mis K.O. auparavant.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, its Attack and Sp. Atk stats are slightly boosted for each of the allies in its party that have already been defeated.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally’s stat changes.
effect_entries.short_effect: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand le Pokémon entre sur le terrain, il copie\nles changements de stats de son allié.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it copies an ally's stat changes.

effect_entries.effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
effect_entries.short_effect: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand le Pokémon est touché par une capacité\nphysique, il répand des pics toxiques dans le camp\nadverse.
Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.

effect_entries.effect: The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon’s head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents the opponent from using any moves that have priority, such as Quick Attack.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Une étrange queue recouvre la tête du Pokémon,\nce qui empêche ce dernier et ses alliés d’être visés\npar une capacité prioritaire.
The mysterious tail covering the Pokémon's head makes opponents unable to use priority moves against the Pokémon or its allies.

effect_entries.effect: If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Si le Pokémon est touché par une capacité de type Sol,\nil regagne des PV au lieu de subir des dégâts.
If hit by a Ground-type move, the Pokémon has its HP restored instead of taking damage.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.
effect_entries.short_effect: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon agit toujours plus lentement quand il utilise\nune capacité de statut, mais il ignore les talents adverses.
The Pokémon will always act more slowly when using status moves, but these moves will be unimpeded by the Ability of the target.

effect_entries.effect: Mind's Eye enables the Pokémon with this Ability to hit Ghost-type Pokémon with damage-dealing Normal- and Fighting-type moves. It also prevents other Pokémon from lowering the Pokémon's accuracy and ignores changes to the opponents' evasion.
effect_entries.short_effect: The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon ignore les changements d’Esquive des cibles\net peut toucher les Pokémon Spectre avec des capacités\nNormal ou Combat. Sa Précision ne peut pas baisser.
The Pokémon ignores changes to opponents' evasiveness, its accuracy can't be lowered, and it can hit Ghost types with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves

effect_entries.effect: A sickly sweet scent spreads across the field the first time the Pokémon enters a battle, lowering the evasiveness of opposing Pokémon.
effect_entries.short_effect: Once per battle, when a Pokémon with Supersweet Syrup enters the battle, it lowers the evasion stat of all adjacent opponents by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: La première fois que le Pokémon entre au combat,\nune odeur de nectar sucré se répand sur le terrain,\nce qui baisse l’Esquive de l’adversaire.
Lowers the evasion of opposing Pokémon by 1 stage when first sent into battle

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP.
effect_entries.short_effect: When a Pokémon with Hospitality enters a battle, it restores HP for an ally by 25%.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand il rejoint le combat, ce Pokémon est aux petits\nsoins avec son allié et restaure quelques PV.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it showers its ally with hospitality, restoring a small amount of the ally's HP

effect_entries.effect: The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move.
effect_entries.short_effect: May cause bad poisoning when the Pokémon hits an opponent with a move.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Grâce aux pouvoirs de sa chaîne imprégnée de toxines,\nle Pokémon peut empoisonner gravement sa cible\nen la touchant avec une capacité.
The power of the Pokémon's toxic chain may badly poison any target the Pokémon hits with a move

effect_entries.effect: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon
effect_entries.short_effect: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Le Pokémon fait briller le Masque en puisant dans ses souvenirs, ce qui augmente ses stats.
The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Mask to shine and one of the Pokémon's stats to be boosted.

effect_entries.effect: When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.
effect_entries.short_effect: When Terapagos enters the battle, it turns into its Terastal Form until the end of the battle.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Quand le Pokémon rejoint le combat, il absorbe\nl’énergie alentour et prend sa Forme Téracristal.
When the Pokémon enters a battle, it absorbs the energy around itself and transforms into its Terastal Form.

effect_entries.effect: The Pokémon’s shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.
effect_entries.short_effect: All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Grâce à sa carapace qui renferme l’énergie de tous\nles types, les capacités subies par ce Pokémon quand\nses PV sont au maximum ne sont pas très efficaces.
The Pokémon's shell contains the powers of each type. All damage-dealing moves that hit the Pokémon when its HP is full will not be very effective.

effect_entries.effect: When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.
effect_entries.short_effect: As soon as Terapagos assumes its Stellar Form, it will immediately neutralize weather and terrain effects.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Lorsque Terapagos prend sa Forme Stellaire, il utilise\nson pouvoir enfoui pour annuler les effets de la météo\net des champs actifs.
When Terapagos changes into its Stellar Form, it uses its hidden powers to eliminate all effects of weather and terrain, reducing them to zero.

effect_entries.effect: When a Pokémon is poisoned by any of Pecharunt's moves, it will also become confused.
effect_entries.short_effect: Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Lorsque Pêchaminus empoisonne un Pokémon grâce\nà l’une de ses capacités, ce dernier devient également\nconfus.
Pokémon poisoned by Pecharunt's moves will also become confused.
